H0.text: What is the name of the Sergeant who constantly harasses the goldbricking Private Beetle Bailey in the comic strip of the same name. Sarge

H1.text: What is the name of the Sergeant who constantly harasses the goldbricking Private Beetle Bailey in the comic strip of the same name. Bellow

H2.text: What is the name of the Sergeant who constantly harasses the goldbricking Private Beetle Bailey in the comic strip of the same name. Slug

H3.text: What is the name of the Sergeant who constantly harasses the goldbricking Private Beetle Bailey in the comic strip of the same name. Snorkle

A4.text: The text refers to the harassing sergeant as Sergeant Snorkel, not Snorkle.
